ReleaseNotes.Note: Ability to star correct sense id for current verse in Marble tab
EnhancedView font settings will now persist between sessions
MirrorView scaling slider
Made Pins, Biblical Terms, and Marble tabs more friendly when using the MirrorView
Made Pan and Zoom Control easier to move around
Restyled many buttons
Fix - Fixed issue where searching in Biblical Terms when set to “All” threw an exception
Fix - Fixed issue where long verses in the Biblical Terms tab weren’t scrollable
Fix - Fixed issue where exception is thrown when clicking on verse ref in Biblical Terms
Fix - Fixed issue where opening TextCollections crashed application
Fix - Fixed cut off text in TextCollections
Fix - Fixed issue where large text in Pins would get cut off
Fix - resolved issue where the menus for a node in the Project Design Surface were not created properly in IsResource was null
Fix - Fixed missing World Clock icons
In the MARBLE window, the user can now do word searches of the Hebrew and Greek.
Fix - Since the last refactoring effort, the font family was no longer showing up properly for the source/target corpus.  This build fixes that.
Fix - The Enhanced View that allowed the user to control the font size, etc of the verses below became broken in the refactoring process.  This has been repaired in this build.
In the interlinear view, the words that do not have alignments associated with them no longer show a blank for the gloss but instead an underlined area (“__”)

There are known issues with the interlinear view where there will be two of the same words but only one of them will have a gloss associated with it.  The bug has been found and will make it into the next release.
In the MARBLE window, the interface doesn’t flag the current sense yet.  Likewise, in the description field, the links haven’t been rendered yet.
Ability to update which books a corpus contains after it has been initially tokenized
Highlighting of current verse for translations in TextCollections panel
Fix - The BookChapterVerse control no longer is by default unsynced to Paratext
Fix - Fix for not being able to delete project from initial screen

Fix - Multiple fixes for the PINS module related to how verse references were being sorted.  This module was throwing many errors and really slowing down the initial display.  Now rewritten to eliminate the errors and increase the speed.
Project Display Surface context menus for both nodes and parallel lines has the unused “Properties” option removed.
Disabled File\New & File\Open until they are more stable
Fix - Resolved right to left issues and word groupings
Fix - Pins verse references now have proper font
Ability to push a note to Paratext.
Ability to select which books of a corpus you want to import into Dashboard.  This gives the end user the ability to skip over work-in-progress books with USFM errors.
MARBLE panel includes more information on the parts-of-speech
The Enhanced Views now load in parallel instead of sequentially.  This significantly improves project load speeds.
Text Collections to include styling from Paratext
MARBLE source/english word searching

The bug in the trees pertaining to unicode, where a character's modifying unicode character is in the next leaf, resulting in what looks like a 'zero' with a modifying character above/below, has not been resolved.
Malachi 4 is not being versified properly.
The Dashboard book chapter verse control does not affect Paratext
Change - Changes were made to the database schema to allow for only selecting certain books to be tokenized
Project Version number to start up.  Red means that the project is not compatible with the current version of dashboard.
Marble tab that shows visuals on how a word is commonly translated

Replaced the Word Meanings panel with the MARBLE panel.  This is a much deeper dive into the SDBH/SDBG database unveiling lots of additional data for each word.  Note that this panel is a work in progress.
Release Notes window now appears on the startup screen and includes full history of release notes separated by version number.  Also now notes when there is a breaking change
Fix - Resolved issue where Hebrew did not display right to left
Fix - The Enhanced VIew would sometimes report that a corpus was not within a verse range when it actually was.
Change - Added AppVersion column to project database
Create Project button when searched project doesn’t appear
Enhanced View now has been wired up to show the preferred FontFamily as designated by the project settings in Paratext
Fix - Hebrew is now Right to Left in alignment verse displays
Fix - verse display now updates when the project consists of just a NT corpus from Paratext that was added when the Current Bcv was set to be in the OT
Fix - Handled pins exceptions in the case of a new paratext project that might lack certain datasets
Plumbed up the project’s default font from the Paratext’s settings through to the Enhanced View.  Note, currently the VerseDisplay component still does not correctly display the right font.
On the Creation of Parallel Alignments/Interlinear dialogs, there is a new button on the first wizard page by which the user can just run through all the default settings without user interaction.
Note is selected event
Fix - Multi-Deselect issue fixed
Notes display and interactivity
New menu Help\Show Logs which will launch the current log file into a new window for display
There are upcoming changes to Notes that are not included in this release.
Additional modeling of the Notes Threading framework.
Recognition of Daughter project types in the Project Design Surface
Right clicking on a word in the Enhanced view allows the option to filter Pins by that word.
Right clicking on a word (or group of selected words) in the Enhanced view allows the option to quickly translate that word using Google translate.
Tooltip in pins on XmlSource badges with the path of the source file for the data
The word senses button in word meanings now appears disabled when total senses = 1
Fix - Removed ILogger casting issue
Fix - Fixed issue where using Project/All radio buttons in Biblical Terms would delete all rows.
Fix - Fixed issue where Content was not appearing in the right window of Biblical Terms.
Fix - Fixed issue where some Verse Ref buttons appear to have no verse refs when in fact they did.  This fix also sped up Pins loading times.
About box which shows version information
Dashboard now checks for updates and displays this Change Log information about what has been added, updated, changed, bug fixed or deferred.
Ability to send end user’s Dashboard log files, Paratext Log files and the users computer information; including encryption status
Additional modeling of the Notes framework.
Did internal testing on the effects of drive encryption on database usage.  The use of drive encryption only slows down Dashboard by a relatively small percentage.
Pins now includes verse references drawn from Paratext’s Interlinear_*.xml files
Word senses button in word meanings control enabled.
the verse display code in regard to notes, labels and mouse events.
Fix - Fixed shutdown/dispose exception handler
Fix - Fixed never-ending progress wheel when clicking on the verse reference button in Pins.
Fix - Fixed issue where spamming BCV control in Paratext or Dashboard results in constant change of current BCV.
Fix - Fixed issue where sometimes changing chapters via the verse up/down button in the BCV control doesn’t result in the correct BCV.
